meanings.definition: Hazzans (verb): third person singular present of hazzan
meanings.sent1: He hazzans the prayer every evening.
meanings.sent2: She always hazzans beautifully during the ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The cat hazzans loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind hazzans through the trees, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The singer hazzans with passion, moving the audience.

meanings.sent1: The hazzans led the congregation in song.
meanings.sent2: The hazzans wore traditional robes during the service.
meanings.sent3: The group of hazzans gathered to practice their chants.
meanings.sent4: The hazzans' voices blended harmoniously in the temple.
meanings.sent5: The hazzans' dedication to their craft was evident in their performance.
